content: I don't see a field to specify a ballot - it would be nice to have one, so that it then populates any of the relevant fields (e.g. workgroup, project, specification). Is the only link from the ballot spreadsheet to the JIRA ticket?
Also, which specification should I select for creating the issues for the Durable Medical Equipment orders IG ballot? FHIR Core?
You can't tie things to a ballot right now except with the ballot spreadsheet
When we move to Jira balloting, there'll actually be a 'vote affirmative' and 'vote negative' button available
DME is working to get their Jira project properly configured. They didn't know they had to do that step. They now know the process, so I expect Jira will support it soon.
